headline: Mercedes Ann Wathen

description: U.S. sales of luxury vehicles slid 1.6 percent in April to 159,793, driven by big declines at the top three brands, with Mercedes-Benz maintaining and expanding its lead over rivals BMW and Lexus. Mercedes and BMW, No. 1 and No. 2, both cited limited ...
headline: Mercedes maintains luxury U.S. sales lead in April

description: DaimlerChrysler AG said that April sales of its Mercedes Car Group, including the Smart micro division, dropped five per cent from the same month in the previous year. The German-US automaker said its struggling Mercedes Car Group sold 100,800 cars in ...
headline: Mercedes' April sales dip five per cent

description: It was confirmed by Mercedes-Benz’s parent company Daimler and Bosch back in July that they would be launching a pilot program for their robo-taxi service in Silicon Valley next year. Some additional details have been confirmed about the service.
headline: Self-Driving Mercedes S-Class Taxi Service Launches In San Jose Next Year

description: A drug dealer in Westchester is facing decades in prison for distributing heroin throughout the area. Leibys “Celly” Mercedes of the Bronx was found guilty of conspiring to distribute more than 100 grams of heroin in Yonkers following a four-day trial.
headline: Westchester Heroin Dealer Facing Decades In Prison After Guilty Verdict In White Plains Trial
